short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension enhances the features of WhatsApp Web, including a privacy mode and send a message to any unsaved number

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension enhances the features of WhatsApp Web, including a privacy mode which blurs the content of web.whatsapp.com and reveals on mouse hover, send a message to any unsaved number, customize colors, contacts helper
